title: Line Mechanics
description:
About Scanpower
  
Scanpower is an electricity lines company with a well-established power line contracting business that continues to experience steady growth. It has contracting depots in Dannevirke, Feilding, Mangatainoka and Paraparaumu.
  
Currently we have several opportunities available at our Feilding and Mangatainoka depots for qualified line mechanics to join the team.
  
 
  
The Role
  
In this role, you will be involved in a diverse range of overhead and underground construction projects, working as part of a dynamic contracting team that operates throughout Manawatu and Wairarapa regions.
  
We are looking for individuals with a professional attitude, who appreciate the importance of safety, quality, efficiency, and a positive approach to working.  
  
Key skills and experience we require include:
 
Hold NZ Certificate, Level 4 – Line Mechanic
EWRB Distribution Line Mechanic registration and a current practising licence.
Minimum Class 1 driver licence (additional licences would be an advantage).
Demonstrated post-qualification experience in the distribution sector.
A resilient and flexible team player who can thrive in a dynamic environment.
 
  
Apply
  
If you meet the above criteria and are keen to pursue this opportunity, we welcome your application including CV and a covering letter. An attractive package is on offer and will be negotiable based on experience. Further training and development are part of Scanpower’s general philosophy and will be available to those wishing to go further with their career.
  
Applications will close on 23 April 2021 at 5pm.
  
For a copy of the Position Description contact Holly at hollye@scanpower.co.nz
